schema_name: VAPT WordPress Protection Suite — Interface Schema
description: VAPT WordPress Protection Suite — Interface Schema v1.1.0 CORRECTED. Fixes: platform_implementations now reference corrected pattern library fields, available_platforms expanded to include Cloudflare/IIS/Caddy for all .htaccess risks, target_file added for RISK-020 (wp-content/uploads/.htaccess), apache_requirements and module_requirements added to all platform_implementations.

global_ui_config.framework: React + Tailwind CSS + WordPress Admin Design System

RISK-001.title: wp-cron.php Enabled Leads to DoS Attack
RISK-001.summary: WordPress cron system enabled via wp-cron.php allows resource exhaustion through repeated cron spam requests, leading to server overload.

components.label: Enable wp-cron.php Enabled Leads to DoS Attack Protection
components.description: Activates protection against wp-cron.php enabled leads to dos attack

wp-config.php.insertion_rule: Must be placed BEFORE the line: require_once ABSPATH . 'wp-settings.php';

rollback_steps.description: Remove DISABLE_WP_CRON constant from wp-config.php
Remove server cron job for WordPress cron
rollback_steps.manual_instructions: Run 'crontab -e' and remove the line containing 'wp-cron.php'

rollback_steps.description: Re-enable WordPress default cron by removing DISABLE_WP_CRON

status_indicators.message: wp-cron.php Enabled Leads to DoS Attack protection active
